original_title: El Pueblo Soy Yo: Venezuela en Populismo
overview: The country that once had the highest economic growth in the world is now a benchmark of collapse and misery. I Am The People: Venezuela Under Populism is a documentary film that sets out to expose the skillful mechanisms of authoritarian power in the government initiated by Hugo Chávez and continued by Nicolás Maduro.
title: El Pueblo Soy Yo: Venezuela en Populismo
